apihelp-userachievements-summary: Allows actions to be taken for user achievements
apihelp-userachievements-param-uaaction: The user achievements action to invoke
apihelp-userachievements+purgeuserbadges: Purge all user badges for the achievement for all users
The achievement ID (use '*' for all achievements)
apihelp-userachievements+rebuildachievem: Rebuild the achievement for all users
The achievement ID (use '*' for all achievements)
Should all existing user badges be purged for this achievement prior to rebuilding
